page.title: 20Corporal Thomas's Day
page.content: Corporal Thomas gets up at six o'clock, goes running, has a shower and gets ready to go to work. He is a section commander in the transport corps. He makes sure that everybody is doing his job, it could be cleaning cars or driving, and he sees no one is wasting time. Corporal Thomas has a tea break at 10:00 and is back at work by 10:30. He goes running at 12:30 and has a snack lunch. He goes back to work at 13:30. In the evening he goes to play darts, goes for a run in the woods or he goes to have a drink.
